attributes.action: Request that the Prime Minister order the Re-opening of The Royal Naval Hospital HASLAR in Gosport as a Combined Services Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Haslar hospital has undergone a multi million pound refit and is now under used by the NHS. To it make a combined services hospital would show this governments dedication to the armed forces of this country.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/vets-hospital/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
